entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kangiqsujuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:57 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 1:19 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -11.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: E 39 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
